data.comment: The match is underway. Brentford have kicked-off.
The match is underway. Brentford have kicked-off.
Joshua Da Silva is on target to give Brentford a 1-0 advantage.
Goal! Emiliano Marcondes extends Brentford's lead to 2-0.
Sheffield's Barry Bannan has been booked in London.
Goal! Brentford extend their lead to 3-0 through Bryan Mbeumo.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Sheffield kick-off.
The away team have replaced Alessio Da Cruz with Fernando Forestieri. This is the first substitution made today by Garry Monk.
Connor Wickham is on a sub for Josh Windass for Sheffield.
Steven Fletcher (Sheffield) gets a yellow card.
Sheffield make their third substitution with Kadeem Harris replacing Steven Fletcher.
Brentford take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Joshua Da Silva.
Thomas Frank is making the team's first substitution at Griffin Park with Shandon Baptiste replacing Christian Norgaard.
Tarique Fosu is replacing Bryan Mbeumo for the home team.
Goal! Brentford extend their lead to 5-0 through Tarique Fosu.
Joel Valencia is replacing Joshua Da Silva for Brentford at Griffin Park.
That's full-time at Griffin Park. The final score is 5-0.
